thread.section_title: Sportbike Track Gear Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sportbike Track Gear | sportbiketrackgear.com
thread.title: Shea Moto Diesel
thread.title_full: Sportbike Track Gear reviewed by Shea Moto Diesel

author: Shea Moto Diesel
title: Shea Moto Diesel
text: This was my first time ordering something from STG and I am highly impressed with how fast they shipped out the item I ordered. I believe I got my order within 3 days of ordering it. I had been eyeing the SS Top Dead Center leather jacket for awhile and decided to order it before there were no more left in my size. Great quality leather jacket for an amazing price. Sure it may be a few seasons old but the jacket still looks cool and should be good to ride with throughout the year here in GA (except the really hot months). I will definitely be going back to the website if I need any other items for riding season.
